docs.snippet: Among the first generation of Japanese laborers who immigrated to Brazil more than a century ago, Haruo Ohara photographed a world where man sought harmony with tradition and nature....

headline.print_headline: Mexico Senate Pushes Back Talks on Key Energy Reform Legislation

headline.print_headline: Solano's 3-Run Homer Helps Marlins Beat Rays 5-4
headline.main: Solano's 3-Run Homer Helps Marlins Beat Rays 5-4

docs.snippet: Donovan Solano hit a three-run homer off David Price to help the Miami Marlins beat Tampa Bay 5-3 on Wednesday night, extending the Rays' longest losing streak in nearly five years to nine games. It is the second-longest losing streak in the major...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donovan Solano hit a three-run homer off David Price to help the Miami Marlins beat Tampa Bay 5-3 on Wednesday night, extending the Rays' longest losing streak in nearly five years to nine games. It is the second-longest losing streak in the major leagues this season.
